Итак, что мы имеем? Мы имеем тот же Half-Life 2, только с другим сюжетом (продолжение истории), меньшим количеством оружия и одним новым зомби. Особенность этого продолжения состоит в том, что нам постоянно будет помогать [spoiler]Аликс[/spoiler]. Продолжение очень короткое и большую часть времени мы будем находиться в очень тёмных локациях. Мне всё понравилось. Советую.

조작감: ★ ★ ★ ☆ ☆

기본적으로 하프라이프2 메인스토리인만큼 어느정도의 재미를 보장합니다만...하프라이프2와 비교해서 달라진 점은 거의 전무하면서도 오히려 볼륨은 더 짧아져서 솔직히 dlc 이상의 가치를 보기 힘들었습니다.

그래픽도 하프라이프2로부터 파티클의 질감이나 쉐이딩 효과에서 큰 진전을 보여주었습니다만 그걸 크게 느낄 수 있는 환경이 있었나 싶냐면.. 처음챕터와 마지막 챕터 정도가 아닐까 싶을정도로 적습니다. 오히려 이런 그래픽의 발전을 더 강하게 느꼈던건 이후 작품인 에피2가 아닐까 싶습니다.

사운드 또한 하프라이프2에 비해 발전한 점은 보이지않은 기본 정도를 뽑아주었습니다.

스토리는 상당히 자연스러운 진행을 보여주면서도 고든이 행한 일이 얼마나 파격적인 결과로 돌아오는지 잘 보여주었던 전작들에 비해 진행 자체는 매끄러웠지만 실질적으로 진전이 없는 스토리라인에 불필요해 보이는 파트가 여러 보였기 때문에 상당히 아쉽습니다.

특히 볼륨은 시망 그자체라 8천원이라는 싼값이긴하지만 평균 플탐은 겨우 4시간정도입니다.
심지어 화기가 주어지는건 3챕터부터 고든의 상징인 빠루는 4챕터부터 주어지니 그런 볼륨이 더욱 극심하게 다가옵니다.

그렇게 강요되는 빡빡한 플레이때문에 스토리의 연결점 이상의 가치를 보기 힘들어 다회차 가치는 없는편입니다.
전투와 퍼즐에서 여러번 플레이해도 재밌던 하프라이프2에 비해서 뭔가 아쉬웠습니다.

레벨디자인 또한 빡빡한 운영과 엄청 어두운 3챕터에 비해서 극도로 적게 주어지는 조명과 같이 상당히 불편하게 짜여있습니다. 중력건의 사용이 강요받는듯이 보여 레이븐홈 시즌2로 생각될 정도였습니다.

조작감은 하프라이프2에 비해서 개선된점이 없어보입니다.


하프라이프의 팬이라면 스토리를 위해서라도 한번은 구매해볼만합니다. 일단 하프라이프이기에 기본적인 재미는 보장합니다.

[h1] A DISAPPOINTMENT AFTER A MASTERPIECE [/h1] 


[h1]===[ General Consensus ]===[/h1]


[h1]INTRODUCTION:[/h1]

[u]The Half-Life series is considered to be one of the "Grandfathers" of modern FPS. 
Along with some other titles of its generation, it revolutionized the shooter genre, giving games a new depth and even bigger focus on storytelling and big setpieces, remeniscent of action genre movies. And naturally, Half-Life 2 is remembered one of the finest games to be realized and developed, even after a tumultuous and bumpy development.[/u]

[h1]Now Episode One, really disappointed me and I will try to explain why here. [/h1]


[h1]PLOT:[/h1]

The game is set right after Half- Life 2 and tells the story of how Gordon and Alyx escaped the Citadel and City 17 without dying on the way.

It's a pretty weak story to be honest. The majority of the game is spent inside the Citadel and there is almost no story that is really relevant. They just go through room after room trying to escape Combine and uncovering the mysteries of the Citadel and the Regime, that seems to be affiliated with aliens in some sort of way.

The problem is that, even though the game is quite short, the story drags on and on and on, never delivering very good storytelling after all. You keep fighting through rooms of Combines for no appearent reason.

The best thing I could say about the story is the relationship and the bond you start to create with Alyx. She really feels alive and has a charm when talking to you that really makes you connect with her and care about her. It's definitely the best aspect of the story.

[u]To conclude, the story on Episode One is very weak, it feels like it drags, even though the game's runtime is abysmally short, and it doesn't make you feel satisfied after going through it all. 
Just serves as a weak intermediary (or a bridge) to connect HL2 to the story they wanted to tell afterwards. [/u]


[h1]GAMEPLAY:[/h1]

[/u] Breaking everyone's arse with the Gravity Gun [/u]

Gameplay on Half-Life 2 was revolutionary at the time. It had a crazy amount of polish and work put into it so that it felt the most satisfying thing in the world. 
It really was great.
And the same gameplay is still here. Intact and unchanged. And that bothered me a bit.

I don't mean to say that HL2 EP1's gameplay is bad or dated or anything, quite the contrary. The game has an awesome combat and it's by far the most enjoyable aspect of the game! But there is no innovation on it. No new experimentation. No nothing. 
Everything is still the same, and coming to this game right after HL2 and having the same gameplay mechanics and no new spices was really disappointing... 

The story couldn't help this game much, but sadly the gameplay only made it kinda worse for me. 
There were almost 4 levels that FORCED you to only use the Gravity Gun. It's implementation on HL2 served for awesome experimentation and creativity, but here they just forced your way into it and it made the experience even more of a let down.

[u]There are almost no new weapons or attachments so it all feels the samey old... [/u]

:(


[h1]SOUND AND MUSIC:[/h1]

[u]Meh[/u]

Again, the Sound department wasn't really a great stand out either. All of things sounded the same, guns, enemies, world, almost everything, so there wasn't anything quite new here.

It's true that HL2 has a good sound design that makes the world feel even more atmospheric, and all that is brought into this sequel. So I would say that, although it's not new stuff or anythung, it's still as good as it was in HL2.

The music is almost inexistent, and when there is, it's just to highten some action packed moment with some punk 00's music, that is really good.

[u]In the end, the Sound Department is no big improvement but it's as good as it was in Half-Life 2, so no big complaints here! [/u]


[h1]GRAPHICS:[/h1]

[b]SAME[/b]

So the graphics are actually the best part of the game I would say. They are greatly detailed and the same graphical fidelity seen in HL2 is brought into Episode 1, and that is just great. But even though quality is very nice, a loooottt of reused assets were seen here.

I really liked what they did with the Citadel. The graphics and lighting were really impressive and created a very "spooky", strange and distopian atmosphere, and I really loved the first hours of the game because of that. 

But after a while things start to become repetitive, and you keep going through almost the same environments over and ovveer, asking yourself when is it going to end and when you will see some variety in design... And sadly that never comes.

[u]So the Graphics are very good, they have the same fidelity as before but environments quickly start to become quite repetitive and things get very uninteresting to the eye. [/u]


[h1]CONCLUSION:[/h1]

[u]I was greatly disappointed honestly. I came out of Half-Life 2 amazed by everything, and then to see this world, to after get a sequel where the story only serves as a mere bridge to what they want to tell after the escape of Alyx and Gordon from the Citadel, is quite sad. I felt like I was going from room to room, playing the game for nothing really. Things didn't have weight to it... nothing... [/u]

[b]I do not recommend this game, but it's a roadblock that you have to cross to get to the better one, Episode 2.[/b]

[h1]5/10[/h1]
An amazing DLC to Half Life 2, continuing the story from the end of Half of 2.

[hi] Fabuła [/h1]
[spoiler] Gra rozgrywa się tuż po wydarzeniach z Half-life 2,gdzie jako Gordon Freeman na samym początku przedzieramy się razem z Alyx przez Cytadelę,która lada moment ma się rozpaść,ale my do tego nie dopuszczamy (powiedzmy). Później próbujemy wydostać się z City 17 poprzez ruiny garażu i zrujnowane Miasto Siedemnaste,by finalnie dotrzeć do pociągu i uciec z miasta tak szybko,jak tylko się da. [/spoiler] Fabuła w porównaniu do protoplasty jest częściej przedstawiana w dialogach,bo nie musimy jeździć bóg wie ile w samochodzie.

[h1] Gameplay [/h1]
W grę gra się tak samo jak w poprzedniczkę,więc gameplay jest powtarzalny,ale nie skomplikowany. Wraca też Większość arsenału poza przynętą na antliony.

[h1] Ocena [/h1]
Grę ocenie na 8.6/10 Za bycie odrobinę krótszą od oryginału,ale będącą przyjemniejszą.

Half-Life 2: Episode One - следующая часть популярной серии Half-Life, вышедшая в 2006 году. Разработчики из Valve, решив, что создание полноценного продолжения займёт слишком много времени, предлагают нам кушать игру по кусочкам, сделав систему эпизодов, что позволяет выпускать игры чаще. Трудно сказать, было ли это решение верным.

Игра продолжается ровно в том месте, где мы и остановились в финале второй части. Реактор Цитадели взорван, однако его ядро всё ещё не стабильно и со временем сдетонирует подорвав весь город. Гордону и Аликс предстоит замедлить рекцию ядра и постаратся спасити жителей города. А так же спастись самим...

Игра выходит спустя два года, предлагая нам окунутся ещё раз в историю вселенной Half-Life. Однако окунаемся мы буквально до колен, после чего игра быстро заканчивается, показывая нам смачный трейлер второго эпизода. Данная часть серии стала более динамичней, по сравнению с предшественником, однако заканчивается настолько быстро, что не успеваешь полностью насладится игрой. После двух то лет ожиданий, получаем чуть более чем трехчасовую кампанию. Отчего создается впечатление, что мы играем не в полноценную игру, а скорее в небольшое дополнение.

Геймплей остался практически таким же. Понравилось лихое начало, где мы используя грави-пушку раскидываем солдат Альянса в разные стороны. В этой части схваток с зомби и мутантами стало больше. Так же было несколько необычно играть с Аликс, которая сопровождала нас практически всю игру. При этом AI был улучшен ещё больше. Наша напарница метко стреляет, перелазит через стенки, при подходе врагов слишком близко, может даже ударить с ноги или прикладом. Часто комментирует разные ситуации и делает подсказки в некоторых местах.

Появились пару новых врагов. Так же добавили технологию HDR, которую впоследствии перенесли и во вторую часть. Плюс были улучшения искуственного интелекта и анимации персонажей.
The flare update and zombines addition made the game really challenging and fun, the achievements are amzaing and satisfying to achieve.

Un épisode contre la montre à faire absolument avec l'épisode 2. 

Pour ma part, je les trouve même meilleurs que Half Life 1 et 2. 

Je me suis régalé. 

Ici c'est plus une course contre la montre mais qui vous donnera des palpitations.
Alt,aber immer noch eines der besten Spiele
